summary: A shy girl, outcasted by her peers and sheltered by her religious mother, unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.
cast: Julianne Moore|Chloë Grace Moretz|Gabriella Wilde|Portia Doubleday|Zoë Belkin|Samantha Weinstein|Karissa Strain|Katie Strain|Ansel Elgort|Demetrius Joyette|Judy Greer|Barry Shabaka Henley|Arlene Mazerolle|Evan Gilchrist|Eddie Max Huband|Alex Russell|Tyler Rushton|Connor Price|Jefferson Brown|Cynthia Preston|Philip Nozuka|Kyle Mac|Max Topplin|Mouna Traoré|Derek McGrath|Chris Britton|Hart Bochner|Cassandra Caccioppoli|Annie Chen|Amanda Jane Crist|Mathew Dale|Natalie Dale|Lucy DeLaat|James Fanizza|Shawna Greenspan|Travis Hedland|Peter Hewitt|Samantha Hutchinson|Chanelle Larocque|William MacDonald|AirRese Marie|Holly Miranda|Michelle Nolden|Arnold Pinnock|Irene Poole|Nykeem Provo|Alana Randall|Kim Roberts|Amber Sharp|Vanessa Smythe|Chloe Van Landschoot|Sarah Vance|Skyler Wexler|Joshua William James|Ryan Wilson
title: Carrie
